body:
Hello guys.. So i just uploaded a "test" video to see how the quiality is and such.. And if you are ok with what i can provide (For some reason my PC even at 6000 bitrate wont get good quiality :P) If you have suggestions please tell me! (Ill need them xD) And i did not even bother with editing.. I just need to test the quility
Welp here is the vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0V3mgG7CxI0&feature=youtu.be

VOTE:

1) Motion blur

a. Yes
b. No
